If you have chosen to study Korean, then an interesting but difficult journey awaits you. Like all languages in Asia, Korean is one of the most popular languages to learn around the world. Korean can be used not only in South or North Korea, but in Japan and China. Learning Korean will help you become more familiar with Korean culture, Korean music, Korean dramas (dorama) and movies.
And, as everyone knows, it's important to start learning Korean from the basics. One of the main elements of any language is Korean numbers, as numbers play an important role in our lives and are widely used every day.
In order to help you achieve meaningful and fast results in your Korean language and Korean numbers, we have created a completely new app. Our app will help you learn Korean numbers in a new way thanks to a special algorithm.
Inside our application, you will see:
- learning numbers tests. This section contains a large number of tests to practice and improve your Korean language skills. Before starting training, you need to choose the form of writing numbers in the task (alphabetic or numeric). After that, you must select the range of numbers to study. Then you can start testing.
- quick tests. Here you can also select the range of numbers to study. After that, you immediately start assignments. Thanks to optimization, our application is very fast. Therefore, you will be able to quickly pass these tests using every free minute.
- math tests. This is one of the most interesting and useful sections of our application. Mathematical tests provide an opportunity not only to mechanically give an answer to a question. Before you find out the number required for translation, you must solve a small math problem. Also, you can choose the form of writing the number (digital or alphabetic). You must enter the number received after solving the problem in the answer field.
- logical tests. This type of test will help you to better train your skills. You will be given a sequence of three numbers. Logically, you must find the fourth number and enter it in the answer field. It's very easy!
Using math and logic tests, you will significantly improve your knowledge of Korean numbers and bring them to automatism.
If you love keeping track of your progress, then you will definitely love the statistics feature. You will be able to see it after each test option.
To quickly convert Korean numbers from digital to alphabetic, we have added a number converter. With it, you can translate a number and test your knowledge of Korean numbers.
Our app is suitable for all ages. You can use it to teach Korean to your children.
You can learn Korean numbers with our app yourself. It will also be a good addition if you are studying Korean in school, college, university or language courses.
Our app can be used for any level of Korean (even as Korean for beginners). It will be very convenient for you to keep your knowledge up to date.
With knowledge of Korean numbers, you will greatly improve your Korean grammar. This will help you get started speaking Korean quickly and bring you closer to the level of a native speaker.
It is very important to regularly use our application every day, because regularity is important to consolidate knowledge.
